archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.2c: c) contracts to be redrafted as even rigorous specialised security arrangements with significant involvement from the information security function would be insufficient to reduce risk to an acceptable level.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
